arts.ttl: PSG boss issues OUTRAGEOUS transfer message over Man Utd target
arts.sum: PSG head coach Luis Enrique has given a crazy response when asked about transfer rumours linking striker Randal Kolo-Muani with a potential move to Manchester United or Tottenham. PSG have offered Kolo Muani to the likes of Man Utd, Spurs and Juventus, according to reports, and the notoriously spikey head coach Luis Enrique has refused to discuss the case of the 26-year-old.

arts.sum: The January transfer window marks Ruben Amorim’s first chance to mold Manchester United into a team that reflects his vision. However, the major moves are expected to happen next summer, with reports linking Amorim to a key player from Paris Saint-Germain. arts.sum: With the January transfer window now open, Paris Saint-Germain has the chance to move players who no longer fit into their plans, and Marco Asensio seems to be one of them. arts.ttl: Liverpool, Man Utd Fall Behind as PSG Makes Strong Push for €80M-Rated Napoli Star
